entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
